columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient this conversation is about. Currently only ever expected to be one, but that could change in the future.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: Contains a link the communication record created for a customer service conversation. Not all customer service conversations will have this link, its creation is controlled by settings.

columns.name: MYC_MSG_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The MyChart message type of this conversation. This is the primary message type that will be used for messages on this conversation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
